skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This skill only supports the TOP-001 energy-saving lamp equipment produced by our company. 

Currently, it only has two functions: turn on and turn off the lights. 

When you turn on this skill, you need to log in with your Amazon account and authorize us to obtain your personal information so that you can manage the smart devices under your account. 

After logging in, you need to give the device a name, such as: bathroom mirror light, after that, you can say the following: 
on/off, light.

"Alexa, turn on the bathroom mirror light"
"Alexa, turn off the bathroom mirror light"
